courses.c_content:
此課程目的是協助學員掌握常用英語商業詞彙、增強對文法和句子結構的理解，從而提升商業英語寫作能力，內容包括：
  • 常用英語商業詞彙
  • 正確運用各類名詞、冠詞、連詞及模態動詞
  • 適當運用關係子句 (relative clauses)、條件句(conditional sentences) 、被動句(passive voice: without the word "by")及不定詞片語(infinitive phrases)
  • 正確運用前置詞片語作形容詞(adjective prepositional phrases)及動名詞作主語(gerund as subject)
  • 用「有」表示存在 (There be句型)
  • 正確應用動詞及副詞 (釐清容易混淆的部分，比如: 動詞 see/ watch/ look/ read; 不及物動詞 ;副詞just/ only等)
  • 表示時間及位置
  • 表示歉意

This course helps you use common business vocabularies, enhance understanding of grammar and structure of sentence in order to upgrade your business writing skills in English:

  • Proper use of nouns, articles, conjunctions and modal verbs
  • Proper use of relative clauses, conditional sentences, passive voice and infinitive phrases
  • Proper use of adjective prepositional phrases and gerund
  • Indicating existence with "There be" sentence
  • Proper use of verbs (clarify easily confused verbs like see/ watch/ look/ read ; intransitive verbs usage) and adverbs (clarify easily confused adverbs like just/ only etc.)
  • Indicating time and location
  • Making apologies
courses.e_objective: Upon completion of the course, participants would have enhanced their knowledge and techniques in writing general office documents in English (including letters, memoranda, faxes and emails).
